駂駂駂

駂字的基本解释

駂
bǎo
毛色黑白相杂的马。

駂字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bǎo］
［《廣韻》博抱切，上晧，幫。］
黑白杂毛的马。

駂字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　駂； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1435第16
【廣韻】博抱切【集韻】【韻會】補抱切，?音寶。【玉篇】驪馬雜毛，今之黑驄也。【爾雅·釋畜】驪白雜毛駂。【註】今烏驄。　【集韻】或作?。【正字通】按詩鄭風，叔于田，乗乗鴇。从鳥从馬，古通。周禮，馬八尺以上曰龍。爾雅：二目白曰魚，馬可以名龍名魚，則鴇亦可曰駂。舊註云不宜从鴇，誤。

駂字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
駂字的起名意思

暂无。

駂
Basic explanation of words
駂
bǎo
A horse with mixed black and white coat.
駂
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bǎo］
["Guangyun" Bo Huoqi, Shanghao, help. ]
Black and white crosshair horse.
駂
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　駂; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1435-16
[Guangyun] Bo Huoqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Bu Huoqie,? Yinbao. [Jade articles] Lima miscellaneous hair, and now it is also black. 【Erya·Shiyu】Libai mixed hair. [Note] Wu Cong today.　【Jiyun】or make?. 【Zhengzitong】According to the poem Zheng Feng, Shu Yutian, ride the bustard. From the bird to the horse, the ancient pass. In Zhouli, the horse is over eight feet and is called the dragon. Erya: The second eye is white as fish, horse can be named dragon or fish, and bustard can also be named 駂. The old note cloud should not be taken from the bustard, by mistake.
駂

Nothing.

сущ.* вороной конь с белыми пятнами
